details: Leading the full-cycle development of **Manage My Day**, an AI-powered productivity and lifestyle management app, built entirely from scratch using Flutter, FastAPI, and Firebase.
Solved complex architectural challenges such as **background activity handling**, **cross-platform calendar synchronization**, and **real-time UI updates** across Android and iOS.
Integrated **iOS Live Activities and Android lockscreen widgets** for seamless task tracking — enhancing user engagement and platform parity.
Developed custom **in-app AI assistant** using FastAPI and Google Agent Development Kit to automate user actions like creating tasks, goals, and project management.
Collaborating closely with backend engineers and designers to ensure scalability, smooth animations, and zero-latency data flow between frontend and APIs.
Delivered high-performance Flutter applications for SaaS clients — focusing on **stability, scalability, and rich user experiences**.
Developed **Crooze**, a social fitness app enabling community challenges, leaderboards, and activity analytics; optimized performance by debugging null reference crashes and state inconsistencies.
Worked on **AgreEasy**, a multilingual B2B agriculture app connecting restaurants with farmers; improved **localization**, **network reliability**, and **push notification flow**.
Debugged **Binder Transaction Failures** by throttling isolate updates and optimizing background data processing.
Utilized **GraphQL** for efficient data fetching and improved caching strategy, reducing API latency and payloads significantly.
Contributed to **SimbaCourse**, an internal e-learning platform built with Flutter and Express.js — handled both frontend and backend implementation from scratch.
Resolved real-world integration challenges between MongoDB, REST APIs, and Flutter UI for smooth course and user management.
Collaborated on full-stack projects involving Java and React, focusing on building reliable and maintainable software for enterprise clients.
Gained exposure to professional workflows — code reviews, CI/CD pipelines, and agile development practices.
